entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Canada Bay area early this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18 except minus 13 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
